abstract: Ellis Island Immigration Museum will open two new galleries that will relate story of American immigration in the year's after facility's closure in 1954; exhibition's will celebrate concept of arrival and naturalization, but will also take on controversial immigration issues such as the United States' border policy with Mexico.
lead_paragraph: With the opening of two new galleries, the museum will pick up the story where it left off more than 60 years ago, when the immigrant processing and detention station was closed.

headline.main: Ellis Island Museum to Update the Story of Immigration in America
headline.print_headline: A Museum Will Update the Story of Immigration

snippet: With the opening of two new galleries, the museum will pick up the story where it left off more than 60 years ago, when the immigrant processing and detention station was closed.
